short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: CloudCodes For Business extension provided by cloudcodes software to enforces DLP and access control policies.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
CloudCodes For Business For Staging chrome extension are developed for CloudCodes for G Suite web application which provides cloud app security. This extension provides the following feature which works according to CloudCodes For G-Suite policy configuration.

Consumer Gmail Block
Session Timeout

Consumer Gmail Block : 
This extension blocks access to personal gmail accounts and sends violation mail to the CloudCodes For G Suite admin only when  If admin set the consumer gmail block policy on the user.

Session Timeout :
This feature used to logout the user from his current session of G Suite account according to configured session timeout  policy in cloudcodes for g suite application.
